algorithm_technique: Calculating minimum shift cost for each character using prefix sums of costs
problem_summary_simple: Find the minimum cost to transform string s to string t by shifting characters.
problem_summary_technical: Calculate minimum shift cost per character by considering forward/backward shifts and prefix sums of costs.
key_insights: For each character pair s[i] and t[i], the shift can be done either forward or backward.
The cost of shifting is determined by the character's position in the alphabet and the provided cost arrays.
Prefix sums of `nextCost` and `previousCost` allow for O(1) calculation of shift costs between any two characters.
